statements: SELECT item_name, quantity FROM solo_travel_packing_list;
SELECT category, packed FROM solo_travel_packing_list WHERE quantity > 1;
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_packing_list WHERE category = 'Clothing';
SELECT id, item_name FROM solo_travel_packing_list ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM solo_travel_packing_list GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_packing_list WHERE category = 'Clothing' AND quantity > 2 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM solo_travel_packing_list WHERE packed = TRUE ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM solo_travel_packing_list GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT item_name, packed FROM solo_travel_packing_list WHERE quantity BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_packing_list WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND item_name LIKE 'phone%' ORDER BY quantity ASC, item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM packing_lists WHERE trip_id = 1
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM packing_lists WHERE trip_id = 2
SELECT id, item_name, quantity FROM packing_lists ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM trips WHERE destination = 'Paris'
SELECT trip_name, start_date FROM trips WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, item_name, quantity FROM packing_lists;
SELECT trip_name, start_date, end_date FROM trips;
SELECT item_name, quantity, trip_id FROM packing_lists ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT trip_name, destination FROM trips ORDER BY destination DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, trip_id FROM packing_lists WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM packing_lists;
SELECT destination FROM packing_lists ORDER BY departure_date DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, destination FROM solo_travelers JOIN packing_lists ON solo_travelers.packing_list_id = packing_lists.id;
SELECT item, quantity, is_checked FROM checklist WHERE quantity > 3;
SELECT traveler_name, item FROM solo_travelers JOIN checklist ON solo_travelers.checklist_id = checklist.id;
SELECT * FROM packing_lists WHERE departure_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY destination DESC;
SELECT pl.destination, c.item, c.quantity FROM packing_lists pl JOIN checklist c ON pl.id = c.packing_list_id WHERE c.is_checked = TRUE;
SELECT st.traveler_name, pl.destination, c.item FROM solo_travelers st JOIN packing_lists pl ON st.packing_list_id = pl.id JOIN checklist c ON st.checklist_id = c.id;
SELECT pl.destination, c.item, c.quantity FROM packing_lists pl LEFT JOIN checklist c ON pl.id = c.packing_list_id WHERE c.quantity > 1;
SELECT * FROM packing_lists pl JOIN checklist c ON pl.id = c.packing_list_id JOIN solo_travelers st ON pl.id = st.packing_list_id ORDER BY pl.return_date ASC, c.quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM packing_lists;
SELECT traveler_name, destination FROM trips;
SELECT id, traveler_name, trip_date FROM checklists;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE destination='Paris';
SELECT id, traveler_name, destination, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_category='Food';
SELECT * FROM packing_lists WHERE destination='Paris';
SELECT traveler_name, packing_items FROM packing_lists ORDER BY traveler_name DESC;
SELECT id, traveler_name, destination FROM trips WHERE trip_date>'2022-01-01' ORDER BY trip_date ASC;
SELECT traveler_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY traveler_name HAVING total_expenses > 500;
SELECT traveler_name, trip_date, destination, checklist_items FROM checklists INNER JOIN trips ON checklists.traveler_name = trips.traveler_name WHERE trips.destination='Beach Resort';
SELECT * FROM packing_lists ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity FROM packing_lists WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT destination_name, country, city FROM travel_destinations WHERE trip_duration > 5 ORDER BY destination_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM trip_checklists WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT category_name FROM packing_categories WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM packing_lists WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, category FROM packing_lists WHERE category = 'Clothing';
SELECT destination_name, city, country FROM travel_destinations WHERE trip_duration >= 7 ORDER BY destination_name ASC, city DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, completed FROM trip_checklists WHERE due_date < '2023-01-01' AND completed = TRUE;
SELECT note_text FROM trip_notes WHERE trip_id = 5;
